main_definition: A large landform that rises significantly above its surroundings, typically with steep slopes and a peak.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Metaphor for an insurmountable challenge or obstacle
meanings_and_examples.example: When faced with the mountain of paperwork at work, it seems impossible to complete in time.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Symbolizing high value, worth, or importance
meanings_and_examples.example: His hard-earned promotion was a mountain he had been climbing towards for years.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to express the act of persisting in overcoming difficulties
meanings_and_examples.example: Despite numerous setbacks, she refused to let this be a mountain out of her reach and continued working toward her goal.
